mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN 'true' WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 'false' ELSE NULL -- 이 부분은 필요에 따라 처리 END FROM t_shopping_member WHERE member_id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SHOPPING_MEMBER ( MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, HP1, ZIPCODE, member_address, subAddress, bookshop_money ) VALUES ( #{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{hp1}, #{zipcode}, #{member_address}, #{subAddress}, #{bookshop_money} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_SHOPPING_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR};
